name: bpl-commander
description: BPL Commander - Comprehensive Project Management Application

scripts.setup:registry: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && yarn config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.setup:clean: npm cache clean --force && (rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || rm -rf node_modules) && (del package-lock.json 2>nul || rm -f package-lock.json) && (del yarn.lock 2>nul || rm -f yarn.lock)
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:yarn: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" "cd backend && yarn dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:yarn: cd backend && yarn build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:yarn: cd backend && yarn test && cd ../frontend && yarn test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
